examples.example: 我很喜欢吃火锅里面那美味的鸭肠。

translate.english: I like to eat that delicious duck intestines in the hot pot very much.

examples.example: 我和朋友们一起去火锅店，品尝了口感爽脆的鸭肠，那味道真是太棒了。

translate.english: I went to the hot pot restaurant with my friends and tasted the crispy and refreshing duck intestines. The taste was really great.

examples.example: 每次去吃火锅，我都会点上一盘鲜嫩的鸭肠，真是让人满足。

translate.english: Every time I go to eat hot pot, I will order a plate of tender and fresh duck intestines, which is really satisfying.
